name: IDK Name It George!
description:
How To Play The Game!

To play the game all you need to do is download and extract the file from my Itch.io page if you don't know how to do this ask google! DOWNLOAD THE APP! the app is very useful and will make updating the game super easy when you go into the game it should update itself and tell you.

What The Game Is!!

This game is a project i've been working on it's a simple arcade style 3d fighting game where you throw ducks at the enemy to damage them. 

Controls!

w = forward move

a = left move

s = backward move

d = right move

Shift = sprint

CTRL = crouch/slide

Space = jump

Mouse = look around

Mouse Left Click = Pick up Duck

Mouse Right Click = Throw the Duck
